2004-11-12.snippet: The promotion will mark a subtle shift at the top of Intel - Paul Otellini promises to be a kinder, more gentle leader than his last two predecessors....
2004-11-12.lead_paragraph: The promotion will mark a subtle shift at the top of Intel - Paul Otellini promises to be a kinder, more gentle leader than his last two predecessors.

headline.main: Intel's President Is Promoted to C.E.O.

2004-11-14.snippet: A review of Merck's handling of Vioxx suggests that actions the company took - and did not take - may have affected the health of potentially thousands of patients....
2004-11-14.lead_paragraph: A review of Merck's handling of Vioxx suggests that actions the company took - and did not take - may have affected the health of potentially thousands of patients.

headline.main: Despite Warnings, Drug Giant Took Long Path to Vioxx Recall
